body: As I read the mitto Shido Lustful series I can't help but wonder how many of the rapist got the "bad ending" route, I mean awesome hentai aside there's been several guys in the series that could surely use the fist of Stalin equipped with a spike steel gauntlet shoved up their bums...while being rotated in a high speed 360 degrees motion.
The only thing i don't like about Miito Shidos works is the artstyle... everything else though is *okay hand emoji*
This is getting retarded by the second even by ntr standards. It had a good ending too.
No this is a long running series
Miito Shido's never ending  story of Hisako continues...
